      • acceptHead

        public boolean acceptHead(diva.canvas.connector.Connector c,
                          diva.canvas.Figure f)
        Description copied from class: diva.canvas.connector.AbstractConnectorTarget
        Return true if the given connector can be connected to the given figure. In this base class return true if the tail of the connector is not attached to the same figure.
        Overrides:
        acceptHead in class diva.canvas.connector.AbstractConnectorTarget
        Parameters:
        c - The connector
        f - The figure
        Returns:
        true if the tail of the connector can be connected to the figure
